org.apache.flink.api.common.io

类 DelimitedInputFormat<OT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.RichInputFormat<OT,FileInputSplit>
      • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.FileInputFormat<OT>
        • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.DelimitedInputFormat<OT>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, CheckpointableInputFormat<FileInputSplit,java.lang.Long>, InputFormat<OT,FileInputSplit>, InputSplitSource<FileInputSplit>
    直接已知子类:
    GenericCsvInputFormat, PrimitiveInputFormat, TextInputFormat, TextValueInputFormat

    @Public
public abstract class DelimitedInputFormat<OT>
extends FileInputFormat<OT>
implements CheckpointableInputFormat<FileInputSplit,java.lang.Long>
    Base implementation for input formats that split the input at a delimiter into records. The parsing of the record bytes into the record has to be implemented in the readRecord(Object, byte[], int, int) method.

    The default delimiter is the newline character '\n'.

    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      • readRecord

        public abstract OT readRecord(OT reuse,
                              byte[] bytes,
                              int offset,
                              int numBytes)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        This function parses the given byte array which represents a serialized record. The function returns a valid record or throws an IOException.
        参数:
        reuse - An optionally reusable object.
        bytes - Binary data of serialized records.
        offset - The offset where to start to read the record data.
        numBytes - The number of bytes that can be read starting at the offset position.
        返回:
        Returns the read record if it was successfully deserialized.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if the record could not be read.

        从类复制的说明: FileInputFormat
        Obtains basic file statistics containing only file size. If the input is a directory, then the size is the sum of all contained files.

      • open

        public void open(FileInputSplit split)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Opens the given input split. This method opens the input stream to the specified file, allocates read buffers and positions the stream at the correct position, making sure that any partial record at the beginning is skipped.
        指定者:
        open 在接口中 InputFormat<OT,FileInputSplit>
        覆盖:
        open 在类中 FileInputFormat<OT>
        参数:
        split - The input split to open.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown, if the spit could not be opened due to an I/O problem.
        另请参阅:
        FileInputFormat.open(org.apache.flink.core.fs.FileInputSplit)

      • getCurrentState

        @PublicEvolving
public java.lang.Long getCurrentState()
                                               throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: CheckpointableInputFormat
        Returns the split currently being read, along with its current state. This will be used to restore the state of the reading channel when recovering from a task failure. In the case of a simple text file, the state can correspond to the last read offset in the split.
        指定者:
        getCurrentState 在接口中 CheckpointableInputFormat<FileInputSplit,java.lang.Long>
        返回:
        The state of the channel.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the creation of the state object failed.

      • reopen

        @PublicEvolving
public void reopen(FileInputSplit split,
                                   java.lang.Long state)
                            throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: CheckpointableInputFormat
        Restores the state of a parallel instance reading from an InputFormat. This is necessary when recovering from a task failure. When this method is called, the input format it guaranteed to be configured.

        NOTE: The caller has to make sure that the provided split is the one to whom the state belongs.

        指定者:
        reopen 在接口中 CheckpointableInputFormat<FileInputSplit,java.lang.Long>
        参数:
        split - The split to be opened.
        state - The state from which to start from. This can contain the offset, but also other data, depending on the input format.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException
